articles.title: U.S. bond yields dip from 14-month highs, oil stabilises - Reuters
articles.description: Asian stocks are set to open mostly lower on Friday, pressured by U.S. Treasury yields that rose to 14-month highs overnight and oil prices, which fell by their biggest one-day declines since last summer.
